properties.title: Defining new Parsing Types by Example

section.name: Defining new Parsing Types by Example

body.section:
<objs><obj id="myId" type="my.class.Type" hint="stream">...</obj><objs>
In this section I will describe how to extend the DDTUnit framework.
We'll start with a scetch of the planed type and follow step by step the construction of the new parsing action.
The selected parsing type is based on a patch sent by mstochmialek.
